Experience Ad Operations Campaign Manager Yahoo April 2015  – Present (5 months) Dublin, Ireland On this role I'm responsible for the flawless execution of the campaigns for the Spanish market, I'm in direct contact with agencies to manage the reception of booking forms, purchase orders and creative assets so I can complete the setup of the campaign in the system. 
 
Here are some of the job highlights: 
 
• Management of opportunities in Salesforce, Insertion Order creation and Campaign setup. 
 
• Trafficking campaigns in our different platforms Yahoo Ad Manager Plus, Yahoo Ad Exchange, Gemini Native Ads for Display. 
 
• Close day to day monitoring of campaigns to ensure delivery, optimization of campaign performance. 
 
• Report any campaign/creative delivery issues that could impact each campaign. 
 
• Managing upsells, credits, debits making sure there are no errors in billing and invoicing. 
 
• Work closely with Finance to ensure accurate invoicing to agencies and clients. 
 
• Work closely with Sales and Account management teams to exceed client expectations. 
 
• Provide day to day reporting as needed, screenshots, test pages. 
 
• Coordinate with the Ad tech team the production of rich media ads, takeovers and special executions on Yahoo properties. 
 
• Provide support to the rest of the team from a technical perspective in relation to creatives not clicking, clickTAG implementation, missing macros and any other ad serving issue. 
 
• Support, training and shadowing for the rest of the team as needed. 
 Display Operations Specialist Yahoo May 2014  –  April 2015  (1 year) Dublin, Ireland Working as part of the European Display Operations team we support advertisers, publishers and internal clients across all Yahoo's platforms: Yahoo Ad Manager Plus,Yahoo Ad Exchange, Native Ads on Gemini. 
 
Here are some of the job highlights: 
 
•SME on Yahoo Ad Exchange and Yahoo Admanager Plus, working on Audience and RTB. 
 
• Support Ad Operations teams on Campaign Optimization to avoid under delivery scenarios.  
 
• Serve as initial point of contact for communication between Yahoo and our partners regarding display, Third party and Rich Media ad-serving issues. 
 
• Troubleshoot and work with teams to solve any advertising or associated platform issue. 
 
• Prioritization of escalated issues during weekly calls with engineers. 
 
• Manage the weekly status update for the business including Ad Ops, Analysts,Product and Account Management teams. 
 
• Coaching and mentoring a team of 10 analysts in India through daily calls. 
 
• Documenting new workflows and procedures in the team internal knowledge base.  
 
 Online Digital Ads and Adserver Operations (Display,Video,Mobile) for Google Voxpro March 2013  –  April 2014  (1 year 2 months) Cork, Ireland Voxpro is a multilingual Business Process Outsourcing provider delivering customer contact solutions to companies and organisations, ranging from SME’s to multinational corporations, including leading international blue chip companies like Google and Vodafone. 
 
For this role as part of the Doubleclick for Publishers (DFP) team I work alongside traffickers, ad operation managers, campaign managers, media agencies, ad networks and publishers providing excellent and prompt customer service to resolve any issues that may occur while the campaigns are in progress, serving as point of contact for publishers to troubleshoot and resolve or escalate technical issues.  
 
Here are some of the job highlights: 
 
• Educate clients on trafficking, pacing, optimization, targeting and reporting of ad campaigns. 
 
• Provide Traffic support as needed. 
 
• Reproduce client campaigns in test environment for troubleshooting. 
 
• Assist on the implementation of rich media, out of page, HTML5 and third party creatives. 
 
• Proactively investigate issues (delivery discrepancies, technical issues, etc.) with clients, agencies, third-party platforms, and/or internal parties and provide resolutions to these issues. 
 
• Assist media teams with questions about creative specifications and discrepancies in reporting. 
 
• Troubleshooting delivery issues, performance, product issues and ad tags from third party vendors. 
 
• Support, troubleshoot, ad-server testing, click and impression tracking functionality discrepancies. 
 
• Troubleshoot tags for clients and publisher side ad operations. 
 
• Verify the platform and file bugs - Identify, document and escalate bugs. 
 
• Training of 2 new hires, coaching and mentoring. Digital Marketing Manager General Motors March 2012  –  August 2012  (6 months) Dubai In this role I managed the agency relations to implement the Digital Marketing strategy from creative creation to execution across different channels SEM, Paid search, Display and Social Media. 
Analysed and reported on key metrics to evaluate the performance of each channel and optimize (A/B testing) based on more appealing call to actions and art. Project managed the creation of a new web platform for the certified preowned vehicles program. 
 
Here are some of the job highlights: 
 
• Enhanced and managed the web presence for 3 brands across 10 Middle East Markets 
 
• Defined targets and KPIs for our online campaigns with a heavy focus on ROI and consumer conversion 
 
• Agency relations management to implement the digital strategy driving traffic and awareness through SEO, SEM, PPC, Display while ensuring highest efficiency and ROI 
 
• Created, managed and analyzed our interactive marketing campaigns across different channels such as search, display and Social Media 
 
• Evaluated website performance and Digital Marketing campaigns to recommend online optimization strategies 
 
• Integrated social media to our Online Marketing campaigns to engage our target audience and grow our followers 
 
• Supported dealer's websites to make sure they implement the right SEO Strategy and follow the brand guidelines in terms of look and feel and user experience 
 
• Participation in the Social Media hub 
 
• Digital budget management and forecast Mobile Development Project Manager Golden Gekko September 2011  –  November 2011  (3 months) Barcelona Area, Spain Golden Gekko is the leading developer of creative mobile marketing applications and widgets in Europe and North America, having successfully launched award winning campaigns for global brands such as Coca-Cola, Absolut Vodka, Disney & Universal Pictures. 
 
Here are some of the job highlights: 
 
• My role as project manager involves overseeing the full life cycle of our application development, working closely with our designers and developers to create cutting edge applications to fit our client's branding and functional requirements. 
 
• I'm used to work with several projects at a given time, taking care to deliver each project as defined in the scope within the budget in the time agreed, I have successfully delivered App Sourcing Projects for Vodafone, Samsung. also App Distribution and Mobile Marketing Projects for different accounts.
